title: Scaffolding-Based Microlearning for Enhancing Engineering Design Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic engineering theories and software tool utilization
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment utilizing digital devices, with team formation and collaboration tool support

learning_goals: Learners can complete prototype designs by applying the engineering design process step-by-step
Learners can collaborate with team members of diverse learning styles to complete projects meeting three or more evaluation criteria
Learners can independently diagnose and improve over 80% of barriers encountered during design problem-solving using scaffolding materials provided in mobile environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
